name: Powa Plushies
description:
PROTECT YOUR PLUSHIES!!!

ZAP THOSE DEMONS AND MONSTERS. STOP THEM FROM TAKING YOU PLOOSH.

A game built for an Adelaide AIE Campus Jam on the 26th of April 2019 until the 28th of April( 45 hours total)

use 1-4 to select an ability, and press left mouse to use it. move with wasd.

1 - LAZOR!!

2 - pick up and move objects

3-ENLARGE OBJECTS FOR DEFENSE

4- SHRINK OBJECTS TO MOVE THEM
